thread.title: Wonderful location and excellent staff.
thread.title_full: Wonderful location and excellent staff. - Review of Hotel Villa Saxe Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: ratogras
title: Wonderful location and excellent staff.
text:
We stayed in this wonderful establishment the 10/14th March.
Not only was the location fantastic aswell as an amazing set of staff but the hotel quality was well worth every penny paid for.
We had the family room which was great as it was 2 separate rooms next door to each other which is great when u have older kids or just want to be near friends.
Highly recommend this hotel.
